faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Find answers to common questions about our smart home solutions

q1.question: What is a smart home and how does it work?
q1.answer: A smart home uses automation technology to control lighting, climate, security, entertainment, and other systems wirelessly through a central app or voice commands. Our solutions work without requiring any wiring changes to your existing home.

q2.question: How long does installation take?
q2.answer: Most installations are completed within 1-3 days depending on the size of your home and the number of systems you want to automate. We work efficiently to minimize disruption to your daily routine.

q3.question: Do I need to renovate my home for smart automation?
q3.answer: No! Our wireless solutions are designed for retrofit installations. We don't need to drill, cut walls, or run new wiring. This makes it perfect for both homeowners and renters.

q4.question: What is your warranty policy?
q4.answer: We provide a comprehensive 2-year warranty covering all equipment and installation work. This includes free repairs, replacements, and technical support throughout the warranty period.

q5.question: Will smart home automation work during power outages?
q5.answer: Most of our devices have battery backup systems that keep critical functions running during power outages. Your security system, door locks, and essential controls remain operational.

q6.question: Can I control my home while I'm traveling?
q6.answer: Yes! Our app works from anywhere in the world with an internet connection. Monitor your home, adjust settings, and receive alerts no matter where you are.

q7.question: Are your products compatible with Apple and Google Home?
q7.answer: Yes, most of our solutions integrate seamlessly with Apple HomeKit, Google Home, and Amazon Alexa for voice control and automation.

q8.question: How secure is a smart home system?
q8.answer: We use enterprise-grade encryption and secure protocols for all communication. Regular security updates keep your system protected against emerging threats.

privacy.heading: Privacy Policy

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At Wireless Home, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our services, website, or smart home systems.

We also collect device usage data from your smart home system to improve functionality and provide technical support.
